channel.title: excel on HA
channel.description: Recent content in excel on HA

item.title: office使用记录
item.description:
word中快速粘贴无格式文本

Ctrl+Alt+V

excel中查找重复记录

Home -> Conditional Formatting -> Highlight Cells Rules, Duplicate Values

excel中查找相同记录个数为3的

Home -> Conditional Formatting -> New Rule -> Use a formula to determine which cells to format -> COUNTIF($A$1:$C$10,A1)=3

LibreOffice Calc中查找重复记录

Format -> Conditional -> Condition -> Cell value is duplicate -> Apply Style

  • What is the keyboard shortcut for pasting without formatting in MS Word?
  • How to Find Duplicates in Excel (In Easy Steps)
  • Auto highlight duplicate entries in calc - English - Ask LibreOffice
